title: ‘Star Wars is white genocide propaganda’
text:
Angry, racist Twitter users are claiming that the new Star Wars promotes ‘white genocide’ HARRY TUCKER news.com.au Angry, racist Twitter users are claiming that the new Star Wars promotes ‘white genocide’ HARRY TUCKER news.com.au John Boyega in Star Wars: The Force Awakens. 
TODAY is one of the biggest days in history for Star Wars fans across the world, with tickets for the premiere going on sale this morning and a new trailer appearing later today. 
But it seems a bunch of racist, white supremacists are ruining it all by kicking up a storm on social media due to the discover that a lead-role is being played by an African-British actor, 23 year-old John Boyega. 
Overnight the hashtag #BoycottStarWarsVII began trending, with people claiming that the movie is “anti-white”, even going as far as saying that the film promotes “white genocide”. Star Wars Force Awakens teaser 0:45 
Official STAR WARS THE FORCE AWAKENS Instagram Sneak Peek August 28th 2015
